name: @laser-wallet/laser-wallet-contracts
description: Smart contract wallet for the EVM

scripts.lint:ts: echo linting ts files ... && prettier --write test/**/*.ts && npx prettier --write hardhat.config.ts && npx prettier --write deploy/**/*.ts
scripts.lint:all: echo linting everything ... && npm run lint:ts && npm run lint:sol
scripts.test: echo running tests for Laser core contracts ... && hardhat test
scripts.compile: echo compiling Laser contracts ... && hardhat compile
scripts.deploy-and-verify: echo deploying the contracts and verifying them on Etherscan ... && hardhat deploy-and-verify --network
